dataaccesslayer

Interface StudentDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StudentDaoImpl

    public interface StudentDao
    An interface defining the operations that can be performed on the student data in the data access layer. * Assignment 2 Class: CST8288 - Lab Section: 013 Lab Professor: Siju Philip Date: Mar. 30, 2023

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds a student to the data store.

      Returns a list of all students.

      • getAllStudent

        java.util.List<StudentDTO> getAllStudent()
        Returns a list of all students.

        StudentDTO getStudentByStudentName(java.lang.String firstName,
                                   java.lang.String lastName)
        Returns a student by their first and last name.
        Parameters:
        firstName - the first name of the student to retrieve
        lastName - the last name of the student to retrieve
        Returns:
        a StudentDTO object representing the retrieved student
